    Reference

    All functions

    chagas2012

    Seroprevalence data on serofoi

    chik2015

    Seroprevalence data on serofoi

    extract_seromodel_summary()

    Function to extract a summary of the specified serological model object

    fit_seromodel()

    Fit selected model to the specified seroprevalence survey data

    generate_sim_data()

    Generate simulated serosurvey according to the specified FoI

    get_age_group()

    Construct age-group variable from age column

    get_cohort_ages()

    Generate data frame containing the age of each cohort corresponding to each birth year excluding the year of the survey.

    get_foi_central_estimates()

    Extract central estimates for the fitted forced FoI

    get_prev_expanded()

    Generate data frame containing the confidence interval based on a force-of-infection fitting

    get_sim_n_seropositive()

    Generate sample of counts of seropositive individuals by sampling from a binomial distribution

    get_sim_probability()

    Generate probabilities of being previously exposed to a pathogen given a historical force-of-infection.

    get_table_rhats()

    Build dataframe containing the R-hat estimates for a given serological model

    group_sim_data()

    Group simulated serological dataset by age

    plot_foi()

    Generate force-of-infection plot corresponding to the specified fitted serological model

    plot_info_table()

    Generate plot summarizing a given table

    plot_rhats()

    Generate plot of the R-hat estimates for the specified fitted serological model

    plot_seromodel()

    Generate vertical arrangement of plots showing a summary of a model, the estimated seroprevalence, the force-of-infection fit and the R-hat estimates plots.

    plot_seroprev()

    Generate seropositivity plot from a raw serological survey dataset

    plot_seroprev_fitted()

    Generate seropositivity plot corresponding to the specified fitted serological model

    prepare_serodata()

    Prepare data from a serological survey for modelling

    probability_exact_age_varying()

    Returns the probability of being seropositive for age-varying force-of-infection including seroreversion

    probability_exact_time_varying()

    Computes the probability of being seropositive for age-varying FoI including seroreversion

    run_seromodel()

    Run specified stan model for the force-of-infection and estimate the seroprevalence based on the result of the fit

    serofoi-package serofoi

    The 'serofoi' package.

    simdata_constant

    Constant force-of-infection simulated serosurvey

    simdata_large_epi

    Large epidemic simulated serosurvey

    simdata_sw_dec

    Step-wise decreasing force-of-infection simulated serosurvey

    veev2012

    Seroprevalence data on serofoi
